Package com.flipfit.business

Class AdminBusiness

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.AdminBusiness
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminBusinessInterface
public class AdminBusiness extends Object implements AdminBusinessInterface
This class gives the Gym Management System's admin operations capabilities by implementing the AdminBusinessInterface.
